alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Lafayette; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 5:07AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Lafayette, northern Acadia, northwestern St. Martin and St. Landry Parishes through 545 AM CST... At 507 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Port Barre, or near Leonville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Opelousas, Scott, Breaux Bridge, Rayne, Carencro, Church Point, Iota, Krotz Springs, Leonville, Arnaudville, Evangeline, Sunset, Port Barre, Duson, Henderson, Washington, Grand Coteau, Cankton and Mowata. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 85 and 124. Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Acadia; Lafayette; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin
